sections.heading: order; enforceable.An order issued by any district court of the United States enjoining a risk retention group from soliciting or selling insurance or operating in any state, in all states, or in any territory or possession of the United States upon a finding that such group is in a hazardous financ
sections.text: order; enforceable.An order issued by any district court of the United States enjoining a risk retention group from soliciting or selling insurance or operating in any state, in all states, or in any territory or possession of the United States upon a finding that such group is in a hazardous financial condition shall be enforceable in the courts of this state.SourceLaws 1987, LB 514, ยง 22.
